Title: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
Writer: Dibakar Banerjee (screenplay), Urmi Juvekar (screenplay), Manu Rishi Chadha (dialogues)
Actors: Abhay Deol, Paresh Rawal, Neetu Chandra, Archana Puran Singh
Plot: A burglar reflects on his life and loves; while the media speculates how he managed to pull off so many heists.
